gen:link.label:label: La celda 0004 del estado T_98 tiene dato

label:label.xlink:title: In table T_20.02.a, c0060, r0040 (Non-financial corporations - non-SMEs/Value outstanding - cross-border value): This field (applies for z-axis selection ‘all countries’) should equal to sum of F_20.04, c010 for Non-financial corporations (r190) minus F_20.04, c010 Non-financial corporations - Small and medium sized enterprises (r200) per all countries (except home country)

gen:link.label:label: In table T_20.02.a, c0060, r0040 (Non-financial corporations - non-SMEs/Value outstanding - cross-border value): This field (applies for z-axis selection ‘all countries’) should equal to sum of F_20.04, c010 for Non-financial corporations (r190) minus F_20.04, c010 Non-financial corporations - Small and medium sized enterprises (r200) per all countries (except home country)
